name: Macadamia
long_description: Macadamia builds AI agents that detect and fix design errors early in large engineering teams. Our primary users are engineering teams in civil and aerospace industry - tackling the toughest technical challenges.  The agents scan through all your technical datasheets, drawings and reports to detect errors early before they escalate. By integrating with the leading engineering software like Ansys CAE, our agents fix design issues automatically.
one_liner: AI Agents that fix design errors in large engineering teams
